alert.note: Alert for Genesee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 9:16PM EDT until August 24 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL GENESEE COUNTY... At 916 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Burton, or near Flint, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Grand Blanc around 925 PM EDT. Goodrich around 930 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Atlas, Rankin and Genesee. People attending Everett Cummings Center should seek safe shelter immediately! TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
